body: A ball is thrown vertically upwards at a speed of 10 m/s. What is the maximum height reached by the ball? (Ignore air resistance)
A current of 2 A flows through a resistor of 10 Î©. What is the power dissipated in the resistor?
Two waves with the same frequency interfere with each other. If the crest of one wave overlaps with the trough of another wave, what type of interference occurs?
An object is placed 10 cm in front of a converging lens with a focal length of 15 cm. What is the image formed by the lens?

options: Virtual, diminished, and behind the focal point
body: A convex mirror has a focal length of 12 cm. An object is placed 20 cm in front of the mirror. What is the nature and location of the image formed?
answer: Virtual, diminished, and behind the focal point

body: An ideal gas undergoes an isothermal process. If the volume of the gas increases by a factor of 2, what happens to the pressure of the gas?
A car accelerates from rest to a speed of v in time t. If the car were to accelerate for a time of 2t, what would be its final speed?

options: Between the lens and its focal point
Beyond the focal point for a converging lens and between the focal point for a diverging lens
Beyond the focal point for both converging and diverging lenses
body: A lens can form a real image only when the object is placed:
answer: Beyond the focal point for a converging lens and between the focal point for a diverging lens

options: Light can eject electrons from a metal surface
The energy of the ejected electron depends on the frequency of the light
The intensity of the light determines the number of ejected electrons
The color of the light determines the work function of the metal
body: Which of the following phenomena is NOT explained by the photoelectric effect?
answer: The color of the light determines the work function of the metal

options: T increases by a factor greater than 2
body: A simple pendulum with a mass of m and a length of l oscillates with a period of T. If the mass of the bob is doubled, what happens to the period?
answer: T increases by a factor greater than 2
